talk.abstract: Persona is a decentralized, cross-browser login system that eliminates site passwords. Learn about its design with a focus on adding it to Python-based webapps, drawing from Mozilla's own experience.
talk.bio: Dan Callahan is a developer on the Persona team at Mozilla. He works on Persona's APIs and developer outreach. Dan blogs at http://dancallahan.info and is @callahad on Twitter.
talk.description: Persona is a decentralized, cross-browser login system that eliminates site passwords. Learn about its design with a focus on adding it to Python-based webapps, drawing from Mozilla's own experience.
talk.name: Beyond Passwords: Secure Authentication with Mozilla Persona
talk.title: Beyond Passwords: Secure Authentication with Mozilla Persona
